channel.title: Science on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Science on Notes

item.title: Fair Test
item.description: It is important for an experiment to be a fair test. You conduct a fair test by making sure that you change one factor at a time while keeping all other conditions the same.

item.title: What are Variables?
item.description: These factors that change in a scientific experiment are variables. Question Independent Variable (What I change) Dependent Variables (What I observe) Controlled Variables (What I keep the same) Does heating water allow it to dissolve more sugar?
